Hi there!

This is a test. Some people have shown interest in having a keyboard for phonetics and I have tried to build one. I do not have any use for it, so I am very interested in hearing from someone who is looking for this kind of keyboard. Please, e-mail me at hoardingsinc@gmail.com with suggestions or problems you have.

To use this keyboard you have to 1) enable it in the settings of the device and 2) select it from the list of enabled keyboards when you are entering text. The two buttons below will take you directly to the two required screens. Once you are in the keyboard, many Android devices provide a button in the bottom of the screen to change between keyboards. If not, you can use the button in the bottom left of the phonetic keyboard itself.
